data.message: The first single will feature Skylar Grey, Sia on the second, Rhianna on the third, pink on the fourth, not excited anymore for Eminem.

replies.message: That would suck so bad.
That’s not gonna happen on his albums  he does that shit when featuring in a song
It's happened on recovery and mmlp2 😂😂
Dude shut up. If you’re not a fan gtfo
I'm a life long fan since infinite, and hate this new Eminem.
Source for this information?
Life long fan huh? Yet u dislike him now. Seriously go away. You look stupid af on here 😂
Yeah you don't always have to kiss his ass and like everything he does 😂 I know I'm not alone on the recovery Eminem, but of course you like it, you're a chic, it's all soppy, pop, girlie music now.
Oh my god. How dare you not kiss Eminems ass 24/7, you fake fan?

You guys are fucking ridiculous lol, you don't have to like every single project that an artist has released to be a fan. And if you're trying to deny that Eminem has fallen off pretty hard then you're a sheep. I'm really hoping for some redemption on this album, because lord knows he needs it.
Wheres that middle finger emoji😕
"upon purchasing his album, you have just kissed his ass"
Something tells me your a trump supporter 🤔
No, I can't stand Trump, and I'm not even American 😂 nice try though
Go ahead and give Trump a head then.. EM has always been dissing politician and he pay taxes too
Why is everyone so mad? God forbid the dude has an opinion lol listen to the old stuff, listen to the new stuff, listen to it all. Who cares? Just enjoy the music, that's what it's for.
I like how two cocksuckers have to mention Trump to try to bash this guy
Yo what? Pink is incredible wtf
The minute this guy discredited someone's opinion just because she was female, was the minute you become a retard
Kyler Faithful lil Wayne fan take your ass back to work dafuq
We have emotional Stan's, no wonder you like Recovery and mmlp2 😂
Fell off? Not a chance. Style change, and some pop songs sure, but even on the pop songs his lyrical wit and delivery is un matched, his word play and metaphors can't be messed with
BREAKING NEWS: Eminem will no longer be dropping Revival as Kyler Faithful is “not excited anymore for Eminem”.
